## My biography
\
My name is __Anna Plaschke__, I am 23 years old and I grew up in the German speaking region of Italy, South Tyrol. I went to the German speaking school _Realgymnasium Bozen_ and did an exchange in the Italian counterpart-school, _Liceo Scientifico Torricelli_.
\
I graduated with honours in Business, Economics and Social Sciences from _Vienna University of Economics and Business_ and did an exchange semester in Hongkong.\
\
Next to university I did the education to become a ski instructure and I have tought ever since during the winter holidays at Skischool 2000 in Selva, Val Gardena.\
![](/Users\annap\OneDrive\Dokumente\UNI\LBS\Advanced Statistics\portfolio_plaschke\my_website\static\img\pic06.jpeg)
\
During the summer holidays I have interned at:

  + EmiControls by Technoalpin, _worldleader in snow making systems_
  + Pompadour, _tea trading company_


In the time between my undergraduate studies and my Masters in London I worked in the following companies as an intern or visiting consultant:

  + Simon Kucher & Partner 
  + Mercedes-Benz Management Consulting
  + Axel Springer Digital


With my Masters at LBS I now want to learn programming languages as well. 


If you are interested in my profile, you can look at my [linkedin profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/anna-plaschke-740792170/).
